website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the Hurricane XLT in style, but with more attractive straps and on a platform.
pros: Comes in black and campo black-white (Zappos)

Amazon offers black, bright white, candy stripe coral, candy stripe yellow, marled coral, marled Florida Keys, candy stripe black, French Blue, white yellow, campo powder blue webbing, black/red, marled orchid and gold
Polyester webbing upper, adjustable hook-and-loop closure, universal strapping system
cons: Leaving them out in the sun can damage footbed

customer_reviews.title: Love except they are slippery?
customer_reviews.text: Hi All--I loved the fit of these shoes and own several pairs of Teva styles--But the pair I just received did not have good traction. I slid on my hardwood floor--I am hoping that the pair I received are just defective soles. Its like they are flat--then waxed then flat--on both shoes. (see photo) Can you check the bottom if you bought and let me know if this is the case on yours? Otherwise they are perfect comfort--just afraid I will slide. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda Haberman

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: In love! Walking on clouds every step, every day, all day, all summer long. I refuse to wear other shoes since i found these. There’ nothing more comfy and cute looking. I bough Teva sandals for my kids too. Now we all match and enjoy summer walks.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not only super cute but very comfy as well. Not a lot of arch support but they add a nice cushy feel when you walk. Plus they have the bonus of making you a wee bit taller. ;) Keep in mind I normally wear a solid size 8. I ordered these in a 7 and they fit perfect. They run long.
customer_reviews.author: shoecrazy

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite sandals of all time
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I never really wanted to try Tevas before because I felt that most of them were not very stylish but these are so cute as well as ridiculously comfortable. I've worn them with my sundresses and they are my go to for the beach. Recently went to a huge water park with them and I was allowed to wear them on the rides. Walked around that water park so many times I lost count and my feet were still feeling awesome. Highly recommend for any heavy walking you might be doing at theme parks. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Hurt
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts on the straps dig into my toe and ankle. It hurts. The material is stiff and uncomfortable, but wpuld likely improve after wear. I hsve to return due to the plastic digging into me. I tried wearing them looser, and it still hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: THESE CHANGED MY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously OBSESSED with these sandals! I never want to take them off. They are so comfortable, but the mid form makes them so fashionable and trendy, so these are just perfect! I wear them to work, at home, hiking, beach,kayaking, anything. I have semi flat feet and they are still great. I never want to take them off. I’m normally an 8 or 8.5. I ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Cori Madison

customer_reviews.title: great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to find some good walking shoes before my study abroad in Paris. i got these last minute (arrived the day before i left haha) and they were pretty much the only shoes i wore for the 6 weeks i was there. so comfortable! i got blisters the very first time i wore them, but they were small and i have not had any issues since. definitely recommend! i think they're cute and also soooo practical
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Reedy

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great grip for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: In love! I’ve tried buying knock off brands in the past, and it isn’t worth it...I wish I had known sooner to just buy these!! The grip is phenomenal. I’ve hiked through water and lots of slippery rocks, and they’ve held up so well (and I’m pretty clumsy haha). I normally wear a 9 or 10, and I bought a 9 after reading other reviews. The 9 fits perfectly! So comfy, and I think these will last me awhile.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely gorgeous and the midform heal makes the difference, I wear a 7 and a half in sandals, they Don’t offer the half sizes so I went for a 7 and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Midforms! Perfect fit is 9 for 9.5 wearers
customer_reviews.text: I own two parts of Teva Midforms, and these have quickly become my favorite shoes. I love how they combine comfort with the trendiness of the platform. I have a more "formal" pair (the geometric midforms), so these are my more informal pair. Love the design and comfort. For those of you, like me, who wear a 9.5 usually, size down to a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Levit

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable, Sustainable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely adorable! They fit perfectly (true to size). I love that the straps are made from recycled plastic water bottles. The bottom of the shoes are a little squeaky at first on floors such as tile and hardwood, but that quickly goes away after wearing them outside for a bit. Overall, I would recommend Tevas as a brand and these specific shoes to anyone! So many styles and shapes to choose from to fit your style
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest sandal ever! Go half a size up !
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! This are my second pair of midform Tevas, my 1rst has leather straps and suede footbed (they are very comfy) but this ones to me feel even more comfortable! I'm usually 8.5 and I ordered 9 and its just perfect because I dont like my feet to "spill" from the back! They are perfect if you dont have a high arch and I honestly can't wait to wear them out all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Stylish 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 10. Received these bad boys pretty quickly. Tried them on and automatically fell in loveeeee! Not too tall for a tall girl (5'9) since I was looking for something not too tall but stylish. Tried them on for the first time today just taking quick walk, and the velcro kinda messed with the sides of my toes/feet. Maybe that's just a part of breaking them in but, nice quality shoes and they seem to be very durable! Will be buying another pair all white! Wish they made more colors that were all over red/yellow/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Seline Haze

customer_reviews.title: I ended up wearing these all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as junky water shoes for rowing and kayaking. I don't think they're particularly cute or flattering, but they are SO EASY and comfy. I wash the car in them, walk the dogs, run to pick up my son at school. I wear them all the time! I think I'll have to buy another pair to make my junkie water shoes LOL so I can keep these for my runaround the town and do whatever shoes. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe92us

customer_reviews.title: Better then the old ones
customer_reviews.text: Do not know if my old Teva's are flat because of extreme wear or did they come made like this? Anyway it was a welcome surprise to put these on and actually have a little height and total security with my feet, I love these, and because of some of the negative reviews almost cancelled them, really glad I didn't, I do not mind the hardly noticeable thinner straps, they still fit so well.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: My first (but not last) pair of Tevas!
customer_reviews.text: These midforms are super comfy straight out of the box! Very true to size (I’m a pretty consistent 9 and got these in 9 - they’re perfect). I hate when sandals make me look like I have big duck feet, but these are flattering and fit very well. The mid height is not too tall, I feel supported but cute. Will definitely buy another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable hiking sandals
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe. I switched from Birkenstock’s and like the tevas midform versus regular style because it adds a little fashion flare. If I could repurchase I probably would purchase the black style with white stripe for a bit more fashion flare because the regular black still feels a bit “crunchy” for me. Otherwise I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great for 8N
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised how well these shoes fit my 8N foot. They have also been an asset for my plantar fasciitis. So great that I ordered another pair!. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The thickness is perfect! They are very comfortable, I can wear them all day with no problem. They don’t slide around like I thought they would, there’s a rubber bottom that keeps you from slipping. My only complaint is that they make an embarrassing squeak if your feet start to sweat! Especially in the summer when it’s hot. Otherwise, perfect sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Good comfy walking sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love the MIDFORM gives a bit of a boost. I’m size 8-81/2 the 8 fits perfectly. Very comfortable keep the straps a bit loose. No break in time for me. I’m excited to walk around all day wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: Beware, wedges weren't the same size!
customer_reviews.text: These were unwearable since one wedge was higher than the other by a good 4mm. It almost seems like something really heavy sat on the lower one. They were brand new in the box with paper and everything, so this was definitely something that should not have gone through QC.
customer_reviews.author: Gris

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and will hold up for years
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing fit perfect one thing I found hard was half sizes since I’m a 7.5 I needed up getting a 7 and they fit perfect I would say if you are a half size to size down to the whole size and they will be perfect! Great quality already have a teva sun tan from the Cali summer!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite sandles right now. They’re easy to put on and comfortable for my wide feet. I’ve worn them on long walks and around the yard for yard work. They also look nice dressed up with jeans and a graphic tee. They are my go-to shoes and have already gotten compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very slick-bottomed shoe
customer_reviews.text: I think the reason these were $30 and not full price was because the tread is off. Both the toe & heel have tread that is greyed out / slick & slippery to walk in. I am sure it can be remedied by scuffing them up, but you expect more from Tevas since they are active sandals so that is weird. I know I am not the only one who noticed this because it was noted on a previous review as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Considering a size down if you want a snugly fit with your sandals
customer_reviews.text: I usually wears size 6 for shoes, occasionally can fit into size 5 with some shoes. I debated a while with choosing the right size for this sandal. But since I want all my sandals to fit just right with my feet, I decided to take a chance and ordered the size 5. I'm pleasantly surprised that size 5 gives me a snugly fit, which is just the way I wanted, so I am really happy with my purchase. Hope my review can help some people who may be in similar situation with finding the right fit for this sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Chenle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They were my first pair of Tevas and I love them. They're so versatile. I can wear them with any outfit-- going to the beach, hiking, out to dinner with a cute dress, with leggings, whatever! I've worn them nearly every day and they show no signs of wear. Super comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Halcon Dark Blue color and love that it is not the typical black color of Tevas. They are so comfortable! The footbed’s raised design seems to massage my feet and even after wearing them all day, they are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! I wear size 8 and the size 8 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals! IMO they give more support than regular Tevas, especially in the arch. I love them and they are my go to sandals this summer. And since Tevas are high quality I know they'll last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy with the wedge
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit. Have worn Tevas for years. This wedge is very comfy to walk in. Keep the straps a little loose.... that's how you wear Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfortable, I went with my normal size and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sandals were great for a short time, ended up with blisters due to rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teva sandals
customer_reviews.text: Almost the same as an older pair I have (still have them over 10 yrs). Base is very different. We’ll see how long these last!
customer_reviews.author: lillian lanauze

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for the first time hiking up mountain trails in Georgia. No problems! Supportive to high arches and good grip on rocks and trails.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for me and a friend. Both are great. Really well made and comfortable. Wear them all the time even in the winter. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: i love them!
customer_reviews.text: expected the design to be white but was actually silver. i’m a 7.5 but i decided to size down and get a 7 because my feet are narrow & i’m glad i did. my heel just fits but i got an 8 there would be too much toe room. they even look cute with socks!
customer_reviews.author: jada

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional, & from recycled materials!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of shoes like this. I really like them! They feel like they will be very comfortable and functional for summer activities! I was not aware of this but a tag on the shoe says the polyester is made from recycled materials, which is a wonderful thing. I’m an 8.5 to a 9 US and my feet are quite wide. I purchased a 9 and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Terrell

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these shoes ! They go cute with any outfit and are extremely comfortable! Reading the reviews a lot of people have suggested sizing down because they are adjustable which is true BUT I have fat feet and decided to stick with my gut and stay the same size ( 9 ) and they fit perfectly ! Go with your size ! The straps are adjustable to fit loose or tight (:
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Need to brake in
customer_reviews.text: They rub a little on the little toe maybe need to brake in
customer_reviews.author: mark krantz

customer_reviews.title: ... with my feet and its hard to find a comfortable sandal. These are so comfortable and I went ...
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my feet and its hard to find a comfortable sandal. These are so comfortable and I went to purchase another pair for when these wear out and they are already unavailable. I also wish they came in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: maureen barrett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cushiony
customer_reviews.text: I tried on Teva universal in a store and didn't care for them because I needed more support so I decided to give these a try since they have a thick sole and I love love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Triangle clip hurts
customer_reviews.text: The triangle clip hurts the bone on my pinky toes. The straps are good quality, but the platform make my feet look clunky.
customer_reviews.author: tomozy

customer_reviews.title: Beach Wear
customer_reviews.text: Great Teva sandal, as expected. One of the few products out there that I continue to buy because they hold up so well.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Idk, didn't like them and returned, I never tried shoes like these before and I just didn't like the Velcro and look/feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These Tevas are THE MOST COMFORTABLE SHOE I’ve ever worn. I bought these for a recent month long trip through Europe and my feet felt fine at the end of the day (I averaged 10-15 miles a day). I highly recommend for traveling or daily use. (They’re also the least dorky looking “sporty” sandals)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Love but not enough support
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy sandals but not enough support for my flat foot. I would recommend if support is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: lees

customer_reviews.title: Wear the straps a little looser!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned at first because I was wearing the straps too tight, but as soon as I loosened them up and let my feet do their thing, they are SO COMFORTABLE. They also dry really quickly and are great for the beach! I love that they are minimal but stylish, perfect addition to a summer nu-goth look. I like a snug fit for my shoes so I got a size 6. My feet are usually 6.5-7.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Bach

customer_reviews.title: Comfyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite shoes. I wear them basically every day when it’s warm. So so comfortable and they go with about anything. I absolutely recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice with thicker soles
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Teva original sandals and love them. These ones with thicker soles are great - a bit more cushion and feet are a bit cleaner at end of a walk. Fit is the same as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Annswer

customer_reviews.title: Just enough platform to work with dresses and also for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten a lot of compliments on these. They have some arch support and the platform / sole level actually gives extra cushioning but still allows you to hike or wear with a cute summer dress.
customer_reviews.author: julie m

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and great fit. I'm planning on wearing them to Disney World next month.
customer_reviews.author: Evie from the Isle

customer_reviews.title: Got me out of my Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 and ordered a 6 - had ordered a 7 previously and it was too big. Perfect fit when I sized down, but I also have narrow feet. Love them, super comfortable and the thicker sole makes it feel more ‘fashiony’.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I could wear them everyday. Super comfy and adjustable on both straps! Going to live in these this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: So comfy.....
customer_reviews.text: I wore right out of the box, these are wonderful. I wear 8.5 to 9 and according to reviews, sized down to an 8 and they seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Just don't tie the straps too tight like I did, or you may end up with blisters. Other than that, they're perfectly as described and great for long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine B

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm absolutely obsessed with Teva's already butttt I saw these ones with a slight platform and I'm 5'3 and if anything can make me look taller I'm into it! They came super fast, are comfortable, easy to match other clothes with and most of all they are cheaper then on Teva's website!!!!! These are so worth it if you love Teva's like me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They fit true to size. Extremely comfortable. And the colors just pop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, stylish and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfy and stylish. I wear them as a dressier casual sandal, not for sports or outdoors. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments. I’m very happy with these. I wear a half size and sized down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Linkous

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: These are not as comfortable as supportive as teva tiers.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Bee

customer_reviews.title: Comfort 100%
customer_reviews.text: This product it’s very comfortable and perfect for a lake day for paddle boarding kayaking
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everywhere! They are my go to shoe if I’m going to be on my feet all day!
customer_reviews.author: B. Justice

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these amazingly comfortable shoes on Friday and received them bright and early ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these amazingly comfortable shoes on Friday and received them bright and early on Saturday. You can’t beat that level of service.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E.

customer_reviews.title: true to size for me, super cute
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9... sometimes 8 1/2 but usually always a 9 which is a perfect fit for me in these... no way I could have done an 8. They are super cute, still torn about the platform as I like the higher ones, but I am tall so it's always a torn decision for me... and these are more versatile for all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Meb425

customer_reviews.title: Not cute.. at all
customer_reviews.text: Personal preference here, but these do not make your feel look good. Way too much toe cleavage. I returned them, so I can not speak to comfort etc..
customer_reviews.author: karen s

customer_reviews.title: Tevas Rock!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet alllll day as a hair dresser! And these are hands down the most comfy! Plus they look so cute! Love the midterms! I have the platform ones too and they're both super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Aja morin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the tan and black. I wanted something with a bit of a heel. Unlike flip-flops this stays on my feet walking uphill and on rough surfaces. Would like to see more colors and possibly some patterns as well. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get em
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Wore them for like 5 days straight only taking off to sleep. The platforms are great for rocky roads. No poking through those babies! Want to buy the tan ones too but #budgeting
customer_reviews.author: Hin

customer_reviews.title: Tevas deserve way more hype
customer_reviews.text: I was a hardcore Chaco fan until I got a pair of tevas second hand and loved them! However when I became a teacher I needed something casual and comfortable while still nice. The black mid form tevas have been really cute with my professional outfits and keep my feet comfortable while walking and moving all day. I am team TEVA now
customer_reviews.author: Girl number 200

customer_reviews.title: Poor controls in shipping products.
customer_reviews.text: I only received left shoe. Right shoe was not in box. Poor quality control in shipping department. No idea whether I would like shoes as it had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Like a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: It's like walking on a cloud, oh so comfortable. I'm getting a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: liza scroggin

customer_reviews.title: I wear them all of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I have no arch in my feet and these are perfect. I wear them EVERYWHERE. Grocery shopping, walks around the city, the beach, and more. I love them! I ordered another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: chavelitabella

customer_reviews.title: Get them.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Perfect for summer dresses which is all year in SOFLA. I would size down 1/2 or 1 whole size. I have a little left over in the front. But its ok since its a sandal.
customer_reviews.author: iris sanchez

customer_reviews.title: purchase now!!
customer_reviews.text: sooo perfect!!! got my regular size, 9, and they fit like a glove!! my toes are on the long side so i was worried they wouldn’t fit, but it feels just right! super cozy. feels like you’re walking on a squishy yet supportive cloud! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who is leaving to Costa Rica,they are super comfy and very cute and stylish,she loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Native To This Land

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taken these off since I got them. If you’re thinking about buying them do it! I started off with Teva flip flops and I wanted something strap on. I got black to be safe, but I definitely need a pattern in my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! Super comfy and versatile. Would have one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L Young

customer_reviews.title: Top strap fastener
customer_reviews.text: I found that the plastic part that's against my left pinky toe caused a blister despite adjusting the strap. Otherwise, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Style and confort in one pair
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sandals. I was having a hard time finding the right sport sandals for summer and ordered a different brand and had to return them, then I found this Tevas I couldn’t be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My first trip to Hawaii. Great on the beach and walking threw the sand. No slipping when wet. Love the new style!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery and package but decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, but the item was delivered late and packaged horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Juston

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! Normally wear size 9.5-10 ordered 10s they fit perfectly and have adjustable straps! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Sandals are as expected and received on time!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well made - what one would expect from Teva. Seller also ensured delivery was promptly arranged for. I received the sandals a day earlier than expected so that was super!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for Bonnaroo 2019 and they were perfect. So comfortable and that little bit of height kept my feet clean. These will definitely be a staple shoe and I will probably buy more since then price point is so great.
customer_reviews.author: M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great basic
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal that’s completely adjustable if your feet are a little wide or a little narrow. Very comfortable. I did not need to size up as some reviews suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, won’t regret!
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of footwear. I’ve been wearing this everywhere since I bought them. It’s a must buy, no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin Lama

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I read reviews before I purchased them and several mentioned purchasing a size down. I’m glad I did they fit perfectly. Wonderful for and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teva sandals 👡
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ Teva sandals. I ordered size (8) and it’s true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo & Erica

customer_reviews.title: Buy. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Great style, comfort and built to last. Worth every penny. I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I wore them the first day for & hours straight with no rubbing or blisters. Great for an easy/ moderate hike.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dorian

customer_reviews.title: If half sizes go down.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5. I got the 7 and 8’s. I ended up going with the 7. The 8’s were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D. Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Teva Midform Universal
customer_reviews.text: I use these sandals around the town. I love these because these are comfortable and stylish. I wear these with maxi red dress and a Gucci disco bag in black.
customer_reviews.author: MimiA

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves it, we ordered size 9 and its perfect fit for her.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I nanny two little kids in the city so I'm just about always on my feet / walking and chasing them around. They have awesome support and suuuper durable (I walk roughly 5 miles a day in them)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and cute !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are functional and also chic. Really enjoy the look and feel of these. Exactly what I was expecting. !
customer_reviews.author: wellannieways

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Sandals I love!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and totally comfortable!! I have wide feet and weigh more than I should, so most other sandals don’t cut it. Even Chacos can’t compare.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sky

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Thick sole for long wear. Versatile, I wear these to work + casually.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Axberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfy sandals I have ever purchased. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and never give me blisters. They are my go to shoes for the summer since they are water resistant/waterproof! Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic sandal
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Shouldn’t be as expensive, but good product.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaleeRenee

customer_reviews.title: Please make half-sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this shoe, it is the perfect amount of height to make this nicer than a normal sandal. The fit is a little snug though, I wish Teva would make half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my niece, she loved them. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tyson

product_meta.title: Teva Women's W Midform Universal Wedge Sandal
product_meta.description:
The mid form universal takes our iconic universal to new heights

Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
feature_bullets: Water-ready polyester webbing upper is extremely durable and dries quickly after getting wet
Easy hook-and-loop closure comes on and off quickly and gets the fit just right
